mapper.select: select g.g_no, g.g_name, g.g_phonenumber from tbl_guest g, tbl_user u where g.userid = u.userid and g.userid = #{userid} order by g_no
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_guest(g_no, g_name, g_phonenumber, userid) values (#{g_no}, #{g_name}, #{g_phonenumber}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_guest where userid = #{userid}
